Row.Text: Oh, hello there. I'm Daring Do, Archaeologist extraordinaire and leader of the Explorers' League. As long as you're not working for Ahuizotl, we should get along just fine.
Oh, hello there. I'm Daring Do, Archaeologist extraordinaire and leader of the Explorers' League. As long as you're not working for Ahuizotl, we should get along just fine.
Oh, hello there. I'm Daring Do, Archaeologist extraordinaire and leader of the Explorers' League. As long as you're not working for Ahuizotl, we should get along just fine.
But... now who will protect Equestria from the dreaded Ahuizotl?
You fool! Now there's nothing stopping Ahuizotl from accomplishing his plans! You've doomed us all!
But... now who will protect Equestria from the dreaded Ahuizotl?
I hate to admit it... but I'm in a bit of a bind. Think you could lend me a hoof?
I know this might seem sudden, but it's about time I payed you back for all the help you've been!
You'd better hope your friend Ahuizotl comes to your rescue, because I won't go easy on you!
It's about time somepony put a stop to your plans. Get ready, because here I come!
Let me guess. Did Ahuizotl put you up to this? I knew I shouldn't have trusted you!
I was wondering when you'd work up the courage to attack me! Don't worry, this will be over quickly.
Bring it! I'll send you home with your tail between your legs.
You don't mind if I explore your land, right? I'll even let you through mine, too. How's that sound?
Hey! That's my land you're settling on! You can take your settlers someplace else, or else we're gonna have a problem on our hooves. Got it?
You've got something I need, and I've got something you need. So let's make a deal. Sound good?
You think I don't see that army? If you think you can take me, then bring it on!
Can't you see I'm a little busy here? These priceless artifacts don't rescue themselves, you know.
Oh, hey there. Did you need something from me?
Give me one good reason why I should listen to anything you have to say.
Don't worry. You'll get yours soon enough.
You'd better watch yourself. Next time, I won't be so forgiving.
Do you think this is a joke? Well you'd better think again!
You should have known you were in way over your head! Maybe next time you'll think twice before getting in my way.
You win... this time. Next time I won't go so easy on you!
Urgh, fine! I didn't need that anyway!
Do you even know how valuable that is? Why would I ever give it to you?
You won't get away with this! I'll get it back, soon enough!
I've stood up to the likes of the dreaded Ahuizotl and won! And you think you can intimidate me? Think again!
I... guess I can give that to you. But only this once, alright?
I'd love to help, but that's way too valuable to just give it up. Sorry.
I hate to admit it... but I'm in a bit of a bind. Think you could lend me a hoof?
Since you obviously don't know how to take care of anything of worth, I'll take it off your hooves and keep it someplace safe.
You're lucky I'm even willing to talk to you, much less offering to trade.
You think that trade is worth it? Ha! Don't make me laugh.
